Spongebob goes to the witch's dimension to raise his powers and comes back 3 years later, he asks the witch if he can get Patrick soul's back and she says she would accept the deal if he brings her something of equal value. He then goes to troll city and befriends the narrator

it doesn‚Äôt matter if they are tiles or objects, there‚Äôs still gonna be a collision check for each
@Garrettp375 yeah that's the one
usually they are a different thing but it shouldn't be a big deal if everything is gameobjects
less collision checks = better performance
you add the ones in air to a list
and only check collisions with that list
usually you have like a spatial lookup, it's not on screen, you divide space in chunks and only check the things in the same chunk as you
@Garrettp375 found it https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/592913
it makes sense lol you check things near you instead of everything that is loaded
in other to know what things are near each other you store them in lists or whatever
yes
just gotta be careful with overlapping chunks or collisions on chunk borders
